replies.msg: Tap into incredible PC gaming from your Mac and Windows PC and play at high resolutions and smooth frame rates. Just select games from your personal library of PC titles or purchase new ones from the digital store of your choice, like Steam® and Uplay™ PC. Log in and instantly play the biggest games, with new titles being added to the service continuously.

GeForce NOW uses the latest NVIDIA GeForce GTX GPUs, which deliver outstanding performance on demanding new AAA games. This makes it possible for GeForce NOW to stream games with settings and frame rates that exceed what is possible on most PC  laptops, underpowered desktop PCs or even to content-deprived  Macs.
